title: As U.S. Warships Get Closer, Iran Ramps Up Threats to Retaliate
summary_full: Iran and its militia allies say they will respond aggressively in the region if attacked. A U.S. aircraft carrier and warships are approaching the region.
summary_public: Iran and its militia allies say they will respond aggressively in the region if attacked. A U.S. aircraft carrier and warships are approaching the region.
